reviewText: I saw this in advertised in my DVD magazine and I guess that I didn't read it properly as I thought that this was a take-off of the disgusting porno films, but, to my dismay it was just a documentary by the filth mongers.  A complete waste of money and time. I am very sorry that I bought it.  +JMJ+

This documentary is about the downturn of the adult industry based in illegal downloads, etc. The twist is that parody movies maybe saving the industry financially. very interesting. probably could have been a little better
